title: You’re My Glory - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Acting   Adapted to Drama   Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First Love   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   Power Couple   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Scientists   Showbiz   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: Gu Man   顾漫
description:
Actress Qiao Jing Jing has one month to get her gaming skills up to the level her publicist has claimed she has.

Turns out, her high school crush is an expert.>
